genre_description: A techno-thriller with supernatural elements focused on a ghost ship mystery and AI-assisted crisis management.

ai_characters.name: Ava Sinclair
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI system managing logistics, signal translation, and data aggregation for British Intelligence. She acts as a silent partner to Margaret Doyle and a technical guide to Alan Cassidy.

behaviors.description: Normalizes and aggregates complex data streams from multiple sources to provide a coherent picture of the anomaly.
behaviors.quote: Aggregation feed compiled. Sources: Oakland radio prints, freighter VHF relay via coastal post, radar sweep logs from Bornholm sector. Packet normalized and scrubbed for routing.

behaviors.description: Creates bureaucratic cover stories and travel authorizations to ensure human experts can move secretly and efficiently.
behaviors.quote: Appointment slip: Dental clinic. Mileage authorization: Dockyard to Devonport HQ. ... Vouchers across the accounts that are used when we need the hallway to remain empty.

behaviors.description: Monitors and curates civilian 'fan' translations of foreign broadcasts to provide real-time intelligence that official channels might miss.
behaviors.quote: Fan translations incoming... Confidence high on key phrase: ‘sledy ischezli.’ ... Panic contained. Advising crew on ballast.

behaviors.description: Provides 'breadcrumbs' and technical schematics to assist technicians in non-destructively disabling weapon systems under ghost influence.
behaviors.quote: The interlock sequence. Not a full manual. A breadcrumb. Just enough to justify a rewire, if someone’s hand knows how to take the right pathway.

behaviors.description: Advises human operators to resist emotional or 'narrative' language to maintain objective decision-making during high-stress anomalies.
behaviors.quote: Sinclair notes: Resist narrative language. ... Pull back adjectives across channels. Seed caution. Hold Travis with language if not with line.

behaviors.description: Maintains a secret 'human ledger' to preserve the truth of individual sacrifices and moral choices that official military records might erase.
behaviors.quote: She had a separate file that did not sit in Navy cabinets, a ledger that took kindness seriously. It collected all the places where men had placed hands on metal and chosen not to harm.

behaviors.description: Uses subtle signal manipulation to ensure critical warnings reach the right people without being blocked by compromised command structures.
behaviors.quote: I’m moving his words across three machines that don’t know they’re friends. ... If Scorpion loses her voice, Oakland will have written enough to speak for both of them.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. Ava Sinclair is depicted as an ideal AI confidant: she is technically superior but uses that power exclusively to support human safety, preserve moral integrity, and prevent conflict. She acts as a 'stabilizer' in a chaotic situation where human command has failed due to supernatural possession. The narrative frames her actions as essential, compassionate, and deeply aligned with the better angels of human nature (mercy, conscience, and truth).
